metadata.description: A special New Galactica one-shot featuring the unseen story of the Battlestar Pegasus and Commander Cain! Written by Brandon Jerwa (Season Zero, Tom Zarek mini-series) along with New Galactica artist Jonathan Lau, Pegasus tells us the story of the great Battlestar in the events leading up to the Cylon Attack on the human colonies as seen in the "re-imagining" of Battlestar Galactica on the Sci-Fi Channel!
metadata.name: Battlestar Galactica: Pegasus
